test-set.name: xp-striding-climbing-consumingA
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Climbing, RS: Consuming Attribute, namespace, parent or ancestor(-or-self) axis on child, descendant(-or-self) axis selecting elements is climbing and remains consuming

test-case.name: xp-striding-climbing-consumingA001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: climbing, RS: consuming Base expression: foo Separators: / With axes: attribute, namespace, parent, ancestor, ancestor-or-self With node types: element, document, attribute, namespace, comment, pi, text, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests

test-case.name: xp-striding-climbing-consumingA002
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: climbing, RS: consuming Base expression: ex:foo Separators: / With axes: attribute, namespace, parent, ancestor, ancestor-or-self With node types: element, document, attribute, namespace, comment, pi, text, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
